alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 11:55AM MST until January 25 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, except up to 6 inches in the higher terrain of the southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40, I-25, and U.S. 285.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
